channel.title: noah on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in noah on Barefoot Rob

item.title: met Noah, Ivan, Chiaki, Nancy, and Max for lunch
item.description: 14:59 Saturday 30 January 2016 CST Max bought a car for Noah so we could drive Francois and Flat Stanley across the table. Lin helped Noah with his kanji: ぼくの名まえはのあです。 ぼくの母の名まえは千明です。 I spoke IT with Ivan; his company uses Oracle and some Python frameworks I’d never heard of. I told him about our setup and that I haven’t had to deal with team development much, being the only developer in our company.
